close_rule1: (res[1].STOCHRSI_8[0] < res[1].STOCHRSI_8[1] and res[2].STOCHRSI_8[0] > res[2].STOCHRSI_8[1]) or (res[1].HA_close < res[1].HA_open and res[2].HA_close < res[2].HA_open)
open_rule1: (res[1].STOCHRSI_8[0] < 50 and res[1].STOCHRSI_8[0] > res[1].STOCHRSI_8[1] and res[2].STOCHRSI_8[0] < res[2].STOCHRSI_8[1]) or (res[1].HA_close > res[1].HA_open and res[2].HA_close > res[2].HA_open)
